评论概述: Still trying on new sun glasses designs and...
评论详情: I'm still trying new sunglasses designs to broaden my look and... I love it! I enevrr thought about getting sun glasses this small in frame but it's definitely a statement in itself. I love how it comes with 2 pairs. I wore both to the beach and it's very chic in my opinion.  The frames are pretty sturdy (so not easily breakable) the shade part works well. I do take in consideration that the frames are smaller so you don't have the full coverage of those big sunglasses. I'm okay with that though. I truly like them.

These frames are super cute! When I initially got these, I was iffy about them but once I tried them on I fell in love! These are 2 pairs of glasses that I consistently keep up with and for good reason!
Very cute sunnies i love the Y2K throwback for sure! they are good quality and trendy

Fits my face so well. Not too loose or too tight. Love the slight tint on the lense. Makes outside look brighter and clearer. Awesome!!! Very nice and looks expensive. I love the sturdy brown frames. Great value!!!
These are cool and have a really neat retro style.  They fit great, are dark enough and seem pretty durable.  They are cute.

Nice set of sunglasses. It is sturdy. Has a nice oval frame. Pretty dark overall. Stylish. On the plus side it provides UV protection. it is unisex. I have a matching set with my partner and looking forward to wearing it out this summer.

At $5 per pair of sunglasses, you really can't beat that price. You would think considering how cheap they are they would be bad quality but they are actually great quality and the UV protection works very well. It comes with one cleaning cloth, one carrying bag and a little screwdriver to fix the glasses if they get loose.
I made a video review of these glasses and I would reorder them again.  I like the fun shape. The box is very nice to give as a gift.
Great look and fit.  Quality made for an extremely reasonable price.  I highly recommend.

While I do use 30 SPF on my face, I always end up leaving the beach with raccoon eyes to an extent because my typical sunglasses are big. The size of these sunglasses are perfect if you're going to be in the sun for an extended period of time. And, honestly, they don't look bad at all while wearing them. My go-to sunglasses are higher-end, but these are what I'll wear if I'm in the sun for a long time. Now I won't have to clean the salt off of my good sunglasses.
Two pair of retro style sunglasses. The sturdy frames feature oval lenses with dark tint. The sunglasses come with a carrying bag and two repair kits.

I got these sunglasses for my teen daughter who's into the Y2K look. She loves the oval style, and I do too. They're cute and flattering on any face shape, and comfortable to wear. They have good quality lenses that reduce glare. Would recommend!
Very small and the case is very compact and doesn’t take up much space

Can't go wrong with this classic style. Works on every face shape and on men and women. I can confirm the UV protection and filters all work. They feel sturdy and well-made, like higher-priced glasses. With sunglasses, the nose piece is usually the first thing to go, but these have held up well. Two months later, they still look brand new.

DANAMY Oval Sunglasses for Women Trendy Retro Fashion 90s Sunglasses UV 400 Protection Frame Eyewear  These sunglasses are great for wearing with vintage clothing and still need protection from UV and the sun.

I got these to reduce glare while driving and these are great for the price. Polarized glasses are always the best choice for reducing glare, in my experience and these did not disappoint. For the price, it's hard not to get a few pairs to keep in different vehicles.

I needed some glasses for a 90s retro day at the office, and these have that definite vibe. They are a little too wide for my face, so I can't use them as regular sunglasses because they fall off my face, but both the brown and the dark grey are cute.
Very well packaged, durable and love that you get two pairs.
Very comfortable and stylish sunglasses. Both pairs fit great! They’re durable and the arms are thick. They’re well made and not flimsy at all. I love them!
These fit well on my face and are attractive. Lightweight, but sturdy.  Great to have a second pair to keep in the car.  Recommend!

These retro sunglasses are quite lovely. Both pairs come in a box. They are individually wrapped in a sealed plastic bag for protection. They come with a satin drawstring pouch and an eyeglass screwdriver. Great quality and value.

I got these because I seem to always need sunglasses since I have sensitive eyes. They do a great job at reducing the glare of the sun and are high quality. Since they’re wire frames, they are more prone to getting bent but these are better than most others I’ve had. Very happy overall.
Lens provides tint and polarization without being too dark, glasses also feel lightweight when wearing. No issues with build quality on my pair.

评论概述: One of my Favorite pairs of Aviators that I have!
评论详情: I have 3 pairs of aviators currently, and it's the main style of sunglasses I've worn over the past 5 years or so.  Of the 3: - One has reflective lenses  - One has a gradient between a dark and light brown  - (this one) uses black lenses  The reflective one scratches easily, the one with the gradient...well, has a gradient... Depending on which direction you're looking, colors change.  This black one is just a solid pair of sunglasses.  On top of that, the frame is solid. I've had it for a few months so far - the hinges feel firm and the rubber ear tips are still firm.

These sunglasses are quite nice. They come with a storage pouch as well as a screwdriver. The size seems about perfect, and they have flexibility to make it easier to put on and take off. They are lightweight, and that does make them feel a little flimsy, but I have not had any problems with durability so far.
Good bang for the buck. Polorized and nice and clear.

I needed a new pair of sunglasses for quite and while. These are perfect for me.  They are both functional and fashionable. They protect my eyes from the sun's harmful UV rays and look great while doing it. The lenses reduce glare from reflective surfaces by a lot. I was able to say goodbye to squinting and see the world in its true colors. With reduced glare, I saw better while driving, playing sports, or just relaxing by the pool.  They have an ultra-light frame and shatterproof polarized lenses. Every edge is smoothed and polished. The included carrying pouch, “polarization tester”, and key ring with dual mini-screwdrivers added a delightful touch. A soft cleaning cloth was also included. I am very pleased.

I needed some everyday sunglasses after cataract surgery. I didn’t want to spend a lot so found these to fit the bill. They offered polarizing and UV protection for a reasonable price. I also like the flexible nose pads and the little larger lens.

These arrived in a nice protective box and included a soft draw-string carrying case and a really cool compact tool with eyeglass drivers for repairing, if needed.  The material quality of the frame and lenses is very good, they are lightweight and comfortable.  They look good on me too!  LOL.  Recommend!

评论概述: Stay Stylish & Protected with the Hottest Polarized Aviator Sunglasses
评论详情: I recently purchased the Trendy Polarized Aviator Sunglasses and I couldn't be happier with my choice. The glasses are not only stylish, but they also provide excellent UV protection, making them perfect for both men and women.

评论概述: Good Glasses, not flimsy, but leaves nasal indents
评论详情: These have been pretty good glasses so far. Usually with cheap glass like this they feel as if you can break them just by breathing on them. These are made much sturdier, but the nose pieces for whatever reason are much firmer and always leave an annoying and slightly painful indent from where they rest on your nose. Good glasses other than that.

Lots of adjustability, and the large lenses are clear and smooth! I also like the box comes with a nice carrying pouch and a little "polarization tester". It's not necessary, but it is a nice touch. If you need to know if lenses are polarized, turn them on an axis while looking through the lense and the image should darken or even disappear.  The lenses themselves hold up well, but a clean cloth is recommended to prevent scratches, and I second this.  Overall I think anyone who likes the style of aviators will be very pleased with this affordable set of glasses.

These are a solid, basic pair of Aviator sunglasses that work really well at blocking out the sun and other bright lights while also looking great. The frame fits my head perfectly without any adjustments needed and they also come with a carrying pouch and a mini screwdriver to make adjustments and repairs. The glasses are not heavy and are very light weight. The design is exactly what I was looking for as well. Overall, if you are just looking for a great basic pair of sunglasses that have the Aviator style, then this is an excellent pair. I highly recommend it.

These are really nice aviator style sunglasses.  Aviators are a great style and looks good on most everybody. They come packaged in a nice box.  The box also contains a carrying pouch and one of those teeny screwdrivers for glasses.  Anyway, all of that is in a nice box so this is an eminently giftable pair of sunglasses.  Great for men or women  The shades themselves are a nice weight and very comfortable to wear.  I also appreciate that they lenses are polarized which really does improve vision for driving.
These blacked-out aviators look cool. Like I'm part of the secret service or something. I dig them.

The sunglasses are incredibly light and comfortable. I don't know what kind of metal is used for the frame but it seems very durable but most importantly they sit very light on the face and are extremely comfortable. The lenses seem to be very high quality and the polarizing is spot on.

The aviator sunglasses are very light and very comfortable to wear. The eye covering are a little larger than I am used to but I was told they look good on so that's a plus!! They block out UV light and protect my eyes, while also providing a tint for sun glare.

I love the weight of these. I keep them in the car for my early morning and my evening drives that pit me against the great ball of gas & flame. They look fantastic, they feel great, there's no pressure against the back of the ear or against the nose, and they actually work. I'm on the eastern board and I drive early mornings very often against a rising sun; these things do the trick. Every time.

These are nice quality sunglasses that look good on. The metal frame is nice, sturdy, good quality. The lens of the sunglasses are dark as picture. I like that they are polarized and comfortable on nose to wear. Came in a nice box and a little test to check out for yourself the polarization of the glasses. Would recommend if you like the aviator style!
Nice and sturdy and big enough to fit my fat head. They came in a nice box too.

We lose sunglasses at an absurd rate, and I need them most days when driving, therefore, I try to store a pair (or two) in every car. My son requested these to replace his current pair, and while they work well, he realized he doesn't care for aviator style. No fault of the nice glasses.
A little big on me but I do have a small face. work great and the nose piece keeps it on well! sturdy so far and comes with cleaning cloth and screw piece to tighten.
Gave these as a gift and they were perfect.  The fit was good and they really are good with bright sunlight.
These glasses are very lightweight and fit great. They adjust easily in case your nose and eyes aren't perfectly aligned. I would recommend and buy again.
I wear these driving fishing and almost every where I go they are perfect for any occasion and allow me to cut the glare on the road and water

I was impressed that, for the price, these sunglasses came with a soft pouch for storage, a cleaning cloth, AND, a tiny screwdriver! They look good, feel good, and,  filter the sun very well. Very nice and very good value.

Wearing these makes you feel like you’re going into battle with unnamed countries. Walking on the beach will cause a spontaneous beach volleyball game to break out. Guys will want to become your wingman. Great price, fit, good springs on the hinges. Love them!

I always like to have a backup pair of glasses in the car and truck.  1. This item is just right for the price.  2. These ride on my nose, and the earpieces are very comfortable.  3. Dropped these and they didn't bend or stretch out.  4. They are Polarized and really help cut down the sun.

I know,  I know,  a perfect review from a Vine Voice.  I get it.  Here's the short version:They fit my face;  they're not wobbly or flimsy and they're optically clear without artifacts or blurriness.  They came in a good box that actually found a new life as a drawer organizer and the case was the good kind; better than a little bag but not a really bulky hardcase. Add all the grains of salt you like but  It's  a winner and desrves its high marks.

Nice quality frames!  Love the extra rubber on the ear loops, very sturdy so far.  Does well at blocking the sunlight.  A little larger than i expected (I have a smaller face frame) but overall they fit great and look wonderful!

These are a very solid sunglasses. Classic aviator style, high quality frame and most importantly, the keep the sun out of your eyes.  They look great and function great- these are my new go to shades!

The packaging was great they made sure to have them well secure no scratches to the glasses whatsoever, it also comes with the tool so you can adjust them huge plus. They protect my eyes so well from the sun and are great and very stylish.

I love the way these sunglasses look, but they are also made very well. The ear pieces are thick and help them stay on well. The nose pieces are extremely comfortable. The lenses are polarized which really filters the light for great viewing. They come with a nice box and even a little screwdriver. I am happy I got these and recommend them to anyone!

评论概述: Love the looks of the lens on these Aviators.
评论详情: They fit perfect and stay in place well, Perfect for driving. I Had implants put in my eyes to fix my nearsightedness and my eyes stay sensitive and these are my new goto shades for daytime driving.

评论概述: Great glasses that doesn't break the bank
评论详情: I was looking for some Aviator glasses but didn't want to buy the big brand names. It's always a roll of the dice when you buy generic or no-name brands but I gave this one a shot. These glasses are of good quality and fit my face well. They are comfortable and there's no fatigue after wearing them for long lengths of time. It comes with a bag and glasses screwdriver keychain as a bonus. Well made and look great.
Picture perfect. They fit well and are nice and sturdy. Comes with a nice carrying bag.
These are your typical aviator glasses or motorcycle cop glasses. There really really cute. I love them. Me and my husband enjoy them.

I ordered these for my husband.His expensive aviators have a scratched lens so he needed a replacement and I wanted to get an inexpensive pair as I expect the next pair will meet the same fate.These look quite nice on and he says they are as comfortable as the name brand ones.I was impressed with how nicely these are packaged. The box itself is a heavy weight cardboard and includes a soft case (which could decrease likelihood of scratching should it be used!),microfiber polishing cloth, and even an eyeglass repair screwdriver.I thought that was a really nice and useful extra. Because of the packaging I feel these would be very liftable.they'd be a great Christmas stocking stuffer-Just the right size for that.

It's the first time I've ordered classic aviator-style glasses. I was always curious how they would look at me, and they didn't disappoint me. The lenses are high-definition polarized and filter the glare of the sun's rays, protecting my eyes from damage by blocking harmful rays. These glasses are made of unbreakable metal frames, UV400 lenses, and solid metal hinges. The size of the sunglasses fit me well, not as perfect as I wanted, but it passed the test. I will use them sometimes to vary with the other sunglasses I have. I liked the classic aviator-style sunglasses for their design, and they are light and elegant. I recommend them to those who want to wear quality and sleek sunglasses.
These glasses are well made and comfortable.  The material seems very strong and durable.

I needed a spare pair of sunglasses to keep in the car or pack in the suitcase. This is a great pair as they were inexpensive but still look good. Aviators are in style and they go with everything and are classic. The size and shape fit my face well. They come in a nice box and have a cloth bag to keep them in and cleaning cloth.

评论概述: Quality and light weight beyond the price
评论详情: I love the light weight and quality of those sunglasses! The carrying bag to help protect them, and the screwdriver is a nice touch that I did not expect. The lenses are nice too and feel like a quality product that is worth more than what you pay for the sunglasses.  The first thing I noticed is the packaging. The box that to sunglasses come in looks like an old packaging design. But that is where the negative stops  With these polarized Lens I did not see any glare. Being in Arizona, we get a LOT of bright sunlight. The frame feels of high quality and feel very light. This is my first pair of sunglasses with silicon nose pads. They feel pretty comfortable after having worn them for 40 minutes.  I would recommend these for anyone, and make a nice complete gift with the added bag, screwdriver and cleaning cloth.

I got these in the mail yesterday and got to wear them around today on my drive to and from work.  They look great. Feel sturdy. Lightweight and most importantly, they keep the sun from my eyes while I drive. I really like them. My first time having aviator shades.  Highly recommend.
